6.57: Increased gold bounty to  Power Cogs from unknown to 15-20. Reduced  intelligence gain from 1.7 to 1.3. Increased  Hookshot manacost from 125 to 150.
6.60: Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Clockwerk: Allows  Hookshot to latch onto allies and reduces cooldown from 80/60/40 to 20.
6.66: Reduced  Rocket Flare cooldown from 30/25/20/15 to 20/18/16/14.
6.67: Power Cogs unit trapping code improved a little bit. Heroes within a small radius are now "sucked in" upon cast. Fixed some possible bugs with Power Cogs. Reduced  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Hookshot cooldown from 20 to 15.
6.64: Reduced base Armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.82).
6.63: Rescaled  Rocket Flare vision duration from 5/10/15/20 to 10 on each level. Reduced  Battery Assault damage from 20/40/60/80 to 10/30/50/70.
6.68: Increased base Armor from o to 1 (total armor is now 2.82). Increased  Battery Assault damage from 10/30/50/70 to 15/35/55/75. Reduced  Hookshot cooldown from 80/60/40 to 70/55/40.
6.72d: Undid melee hero collision change from 6.72c
6.55: Reduced  Battery Assault duration from 15.75 to 10.5 (22 shrapnels to 15 shrapnels). Increased  Hookshot cooldown from 40/35/30 to 80/60/40.
6.54: Reduced base armor from 2 to 1 (total armor is now 2.82). Reduced  strength gain from 2.9 to 2.4.  Power Cogs no longer affects invulnerable units. Reduced  Rocket Flare damage from 100/133/166/200 to 80/120/160/200.  Hookshot now destroys trees within a small radius around Clockwerk after reaching the latched unit.
6.79: Units knocked back by  Power Cogs now destroy trees in 100 radius around where they land.
6.78: Power Cogs no longer affect spell immune units.
6.72c: Melee hero collision size now reduced from 24 to 12. Fixed  Hookshot having inconsistant behavior on spell immune units.
6.75: Increased  Strength gain from 2.4 to 2.7. Reduced  Battery Assault damage interval from 0.75 to 0.7.  Power Cogs Increased damage and mana drain from 60/90/120/150 to 80/120/160/200. Increased duration from 3/4/5/6 to 5/6/7/8. Fixed not triggering and burning mana/health when someone  Force Staffs over it.
6.74: Increased  Power Cogs damage and mana drain from 55/70/85/100 to 60/90/120/150.
6.76: Hookshot Now pulls Clockwerk to allies instead of getting blocked by them.  Aghanim's Scepter upgraded cooldown decreased from 15 to 12.
6.71: Power Cogs Fixed a bug that caused them to die prematurely. Are no longer affected by  Shrapnel.
6.72: Reduced base Armor from 1 to 0 (total armor is now 1.82). Increased attack range from 125 to 128.
6.80: Reduced hits required to kill  Power Cogs from 3 to 2/2/2/3.
6.82: Hookshot now pulls Clockwerk to neutral creeps normally like any unit. It previously triggered on neutral creeps without any effect.
6.83: Increased  Battery Assault damage from 15/35/55/75 to 20/40/60/80.
6.84: Increased  Rocket Flare projectile speed from 1500 to 1750.  Battery Assault and  Rocket Flare no longer ignores ancient creeps, Roshan and creep-heroes.
